text: Hi Jon, thanks for the feedback. Makes sense to only load the CSS / JSS if a module exists on a page. Would have to rewrite the Gulp tasks and the Webpack config to handle this setup.
Forget what I said. The modules will not work if you empty these files. DO NOT empty those files.
Really? I thought for sure they'd work... Maybe you have to leave it for initial upload, so that the files get created in the Design Manager, then you can delete it?
